DataElement.preferredName: Dental Implant Dental Restoration Crown Prior Replacement Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to prior replacement of dental prosthesis placed permanently in tissue for replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure or portion of the tooth covered by enamel.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Implant Dental Restoration Crown Prior Replacement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to prior replacement of dental prosthesis placed permanently in tissue for replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure or portion of the tooth covered by enamel.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Materials placed into (endosseous) or onto (subperiosteal) the jawbone; commonly used to support a crown, bridge, artificial tooth, stabilize a diseased tooth, or to use as anchorage in orthodontic therapy.

Concepts.definition: Materials placed into (endosseous) or onto (subperiosteal) the jawbone; commonly used to support a crown, bridge, artificial tooth, stabilize a diseased tooth, or to use as anchorage in orthodontic therapy.

Property.preferredDefinition: Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.:The portion of the tooth covered by enamel.:Earlier in time or order.:The act of removing one thing and putting another thing in its place.

Concepts.definition: Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.
The portion of the tooth covered by enamel.
The act of removing one thing and putting another thing in its place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
